00048 #define SNMP_MAX_MSG_SIZE          1472 /* ethernet MTU minus IP/UDP header */

00051 /*
00052  * SNMP statistic counters.
00053  */
00054 #define  SNMP_STAT_INPKTS                0
00055 #define  SNMP_STAT_OUTPKTS               1
00056 #define  SNMP_STAT_INBADVERSIONS         2
00057 #define  SNMP_STAT_INBADCOMMUNITYNAMES   3
00058 #define  SNMP_STAT_INBADCOMMUNITYUSES    4
00059 #define  SNMP_STAT_INASNPARSEERRS        5
00060 #define  SNMP_STAT_INTOOBIGS             6
00061 #define  SNMP_STAT_INNOSUCHNAMES         7
00062 #define  SNMP_STAT_INBADVALUES           8
00063 #define  SNMP_STAT_INREADONLYS           9
00064 #define  SNMP_STAT_INGENERRS             10
00065 #define  SNMP_STAT_INTOTALREQVARS        11
00066 #define  SNMP_STAT_INTOTALSETVARS        12
00067 #define  SNMP_STAT_INGETREQUESTS         13
00068 #define  SNMP_STAT_INGETNEXTS            14
00069 #define  SNMP_STAT_INSETREQUESTS         15
00070 #define  SNMP_STAT_INGETRESPONSES        16
00071 #define  SNMP_STAT_INTRAPS               17
00072 #define  SNMP_STAT_OUTTOOBIGS            18
00073 #define  SNMP_STAT_OUTNOSUCHNAMES        19
00074 #define  SNMP_STAT_OUTBADVALUES          20
00075 #define  SNMP_STAT_OUTGENERRS            21
00076 #define  SNMP_STAT_OUTGETREQUESTS        22
00077 #define  SNMP_STAT_OUTGETNEXTS           23
00078 #define  SNMP_STAT_OUTSETREQUESTS        24
00079 #define  SNMP_STAT_OUTGETRESPONSES       25
00080 #define  SNMP_STAT_OUTTRAPS              26
00081 #define  SNMP_STAT_ENABLEAUTHENTRAPS     27
